article_title: Coldplay and Patti Smith Among the Hunger Games Geeks
article_text:
Patti Smith was in the middle of a European tour when she was asked if she could write and record a song for the soundtrack to "The Hunger Games: Catching Fire," opening Nov. 22.

It wasn't a good time, but Ms. Smith said she couldn't say no. She had read all three books in the series—to get in touch with the younger generation, she said. The 66-year-old punk-rock pioneer had already penned a poem in her journal inspired by...

twitter.description: For the soundtrack to the second Hunger Games movie, producers lined up musicians who are fans of the popular books.
twitter.title: Coldplay and Patti Smith Among the Hunger Games Geeks

article_metadata.article.headline: What punk-rock pioneer recently said, "I can't resist a girl with a bow and arrow"?

article_summary:
Patti Smith was in the middle of a European tour when she was asked if she could write and record a song for the soundtrack to "The Hunger Games: Catching Fire," opening Nov. 22.
It wasn't a good time, but Ms. Smith said she couldn't say no.
She had read all three books in the series—to get in touch with the younger generation, she said.
The 66-year-old punk-rock pioneer had already penned a poem in her journal inspired by...
